_header: The text of Holy Writ men sayen
Title(s): The Complaint of Man’s Flesh against Christ
_description: The Complaint of Man’s Flesh against Christ — twenty-seven 8-line stanzas (abababab)

BodDig102.First Lines:
The tixt of holy writ men saynHit sleep but glose be
                    among…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…To ioye of heuene þat shal neuere slakeIn to þat
                    blisse god graunte vs wende
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 89-95.
